http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/SBK-Generations.html

Minimum system requirements

- Operating System: Windows®XP™ SP2, Windows®Vista™ or Windows®7
- Processor: Intel™ 2.4Ghz or similar
- Hard disk space: 3 GB
- RAM: 1GB
- Video Card: NVIDIA® Geforce 7600 or ATI® X1600 or higher (it must be able to manage Pixel Shader 3.0) withat least 512 MB of free video memory.
Does this game use rubberband AI?
shit game
everytime trying to play a race.it crashes to dekstop.way ahead of the system req.tried reinstall.any idea guys!!
Also way above sys req, still crashing to dektop when after race loading screen. Any solutions?

well i found the solutions for them having crash to dekstop problems during the start of any race......

1.perform a clean install again.(bcoz antivirus are giving false positives)
2.right click on the sbk generations.exe on dekstop and select properties.
3.click on compatibility tab.change the compatibility mode to xp sp2/sp3.
4.run the program as a administrator.
5.thats it.game will run smoothly.
